trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Em certas situações e para tipos específicos, vários eventos de andamento de empacotamento ocorrem ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and `numberCompleted` is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos logicamente distintos, mas temporariamente idênticos, são combinados em um único <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>e `numberCompleted` é mais de 1.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você imprime, subconjuntos de fontes é executada todas as quatro páginas.

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Cada página deve ser armazenado em cache até que o subconjunto é concluído e, em seguida, todos os quatro <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>eventos ocorrem ao mesmo tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets `action` to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets `numberCompleted` to 4.
trans-unit.target: O construtor para resultante <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>define `action` para <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>e define `numberCompleted` 4.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um pacote consiste em um único documento de quatro páginas que usa uma fonte e não há imagens ou outros recursos, a sequência de eventos pode ocorrer conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: **A sequência de eventos para um pacote simples** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: The action that the packaging process is currently performing.
trans-unit.target: A ação que o processo de empacotamento está executando no momento.

trans-unit.source: The number of simultaneous times that the specified `action` occurred.
trans-unit.target: O número de simultâneas que o tempo especificado `action` ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates what action is currently occurring in the packaging process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica a ação que está ocorrendo no momento no processo de empacotamento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"></xref> that represents the part of the packaging process that is currently occurring.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"> </xref> que representa a parte do processo de empacotamento que está ocorrendo no momento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de vezes simultâneas que a ação que é identificada no <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>ocorreu.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Em certas situações e para tipos específicos, vários eventos de andamento de empacotamento ocorrem ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and NumberCompleted is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos logicamente distintos, mas temporariamente idênticos, são combinados em um único <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>e NumberCompleted é a mais de 1.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você imprime, subconjuntos de fontes é executada todas as quatro páginas.

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Cada página deve ser armazenado em cache até que o subconjunto é concluído e, em seguida, todos os quatro <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>eventos ocorrem ao mesmo tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets NumberCompleted to 4.
trans-unit.target: Resultante <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>define <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>e define NumberCompleted como 4.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um pacote consiste em um único documento de quatro páginas que usa uma fonte e não há imagens ou outros recursos, a sequência de eventos pode ocorrer conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir: **a sequência de eventos para um pacote simples** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa o número de vezes simultâneas que a ação que é identificada no <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>ocorreu.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> </xref:System.Int32>
